He also hopes to use these funds to bring on a new employee in the next few months.  

Eleuterio says that without the loan from Accion Texas Inc., he would not have been able to grow his business or create new jobs.

loans.use: to buy new paint brushes, rollers, paint, nails and power tools.

loans.name: Marcela

texts.en:
This is Marcela. She previously accessed a loan of 22,000 PHP that she used to buy gardening materials and supplies needed in her pineapple farming business. Her earnings have been a big help in her personal, household, and business expenditures.

Marcela would like to apply for another loan of 30,000 PHP. She will use the loan to buy gardening materials like wire and baskets and supplies such as seed and fertilizer needed in her business. Her profits from his business will definitely help her cover her family's daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Marcela hopes that her business will continue to grow and expand and she dreams of having a good life. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God, which she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for fertilizer and farm inputs needed in her pineapple farming business

loans.name: Marcos Tulio

texts.es: marcos de 34 años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos en casa propia, el se dedica a la compra y venta de verduras:  plátanos, tomates, cebollas, chiles, aguacates entre otros tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el lugar donde comercia es muy estratégico para la actividad y además muy concurrido de personas, ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefiere porque su producto es fresco, a buen precio, de calidad y con un excelente servicio;marcos es un hombre trabajador, dedicado a su labor con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre está buscando alternativas que le permitan alcanzar el éxito, en las últimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital que lo respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar verduras por mayor. El tiene buenas referencias de pago, esta agradecido con el apoyo y asegura que podrá saldar la deuda, a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Marcos, 34, lives with his life partner and two children in his own house. He sells vegetables: plantains, tomatoes, onions, chiles, avocados, and others. He has been a saleman for several years, which has given him the experience needed to improve profits. His business is strategically located and well-trafficked. He has many customers who prefer to shop with him because he offers high quality fresh produce, good prices, and great service.

Marcos is hardworking, dedicated, and anxious to succeed. He is always looking for ways to reach success. Demand has increased in recent weeks, and he wants to take advantage of this to invest, but he lacks the capital to do so. 

He has applied to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy wholesale vegetables. He has excellent credit references and is grateful for the support. He is sure he will be able to repay his loan and is confident that he can give his family a better life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale vegetables.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es: Doña Maria de 57 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, maria es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora. Hace algunos años se decidió en poner un pequeño negocio en su hogar de  residencia. El negocio consiste en una pequeña tienda que con gran esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener a lo largo de varios años. Cuenta con mucha clientela ya que para maria lo más importante son los clientes, siempre los atiende con una sonrisa y mucha amabilidad, razón por la cual se ha ganado la confianza de muchos en la zona y a demás porque siempre tiene lo que los clientes buscan. Ella  sueña con dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y sabe que la única fuente de  ingresos es su pequeño negocio, por tanto no puede descuidarse de  el, por lo que cada día trabaja duramente para por mantenerlo activo. Es por esta razón que se motivo en solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para poder invertir en su tiendita y abastecerla con todo tipo de  productos como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, café, golosinas, aceite, papel, detergente, y de más productos atractivos para los clientes. Confía que de esta manera logrará cumplir su sueño.
texts.en:
María, 57, lives with her family in her own house.  She’s an enterprising, hardworking woman.  A few years ago she decided to start a small, home-based business.  The business consists of a small store that with great effort and dedication she’s managed to keep in operation for several years.  She has a large clientele because her customers are most important for María.  She always greets them with a smile and much kindness which is why she’s won over the trust of many in the zone; besides she always stocks what the customers are looking for.

She dreams with giving her family a better quality of life and knows that her only source of income is her small store so she must not neglect it and must work daily very hard to keep it going.  Because of this she’s decided to request this loan from Integral to be able to invest in her little store and stock it with all types of products like rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, snacks, oil, paper, detergent and other products attractive to her customers.  She trusts that in this way she’ll be able to reach her dream.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, pork, cheese, beans, etc.

loans.name: Maa Tarini Group

texts.en:
This group is called Maa Tarini and was formed in the year 2006. Its four members are all women from the town of M. Rampur. It is located in the district of Kalahandi, one of the poorest districts in India. One of the members of this group is Bijayalaxmi. The one standing on the extreme left with her hand raised in the photo is Bijayalaxmi. She is a 48-year-old married lady, living with her husband, one daughter age 21 and one son age 25. 

Bijayalaxmi has been running a fancy store in M. Rampur for the last 15 years with the help of her husband. She sells items like bangles, talc, nail polish, clips, combs, mirrors, face cream, ribbon, oil etc. Bijayalaxmi says there is a lot of demand as it is a huge market with almost 30 villages depending on this market and that she does not have enough stock to meet the demand. She does not like saying “No” to her customers and wants to be able to give the best service to them. She now wants to buy more stock of what she is selling like bangles, talc, nail polish, clips, combs, mirrors, face cream, ribbon etc. to increase her inventory level to be able to meet the demand and seize the business opportunity. The present loan will be used by her to purchase increased stock in bulk, which will reduce her buying costs and increase her selling. She hopes to save enough from her increased revenues for her daughter's wedding.

The other three members of her group are Gayatri, Puspanjali and Deepa who run a dry cleaning business, a cycle mart and a general store business.

loans.use: To purchase bangles, talc, nail polish, clips, combs, mirrors, face cream, ribbon etc

loans.name: Elsa Lilian

texts.es: Elsa de 34 años de edad, vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, Ella posee una tienda donde vende pan, refrescos, aceites, verduras, frutas, golosinas y también de primera necesidad como: jabón y shampoo entre otras cosas tiene su negocio en su casa de habitación. Elsa solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda surtir aún más la tienda con granos básicos, azúcar, aceite, huevos, refrescos, gaseosas, agua, etc. de manera que pueda atender mejor a sus clientes y de esta misma forma mejorar sus ventas lo cual es su prioridad para sacar adelante su hogar.
texts.en:
Elsa, 34, lives with her two children in her own house.  She has store where she sells bread, soft-drinks, oil, vegetables, snacks and also basic staples like soap and shampoo, among other things.  The business is home-based.

She’s requesting a loan by means of which she can stock the store still more with basic grains, sugar, oil, eggs, soft-drinks, beverages, water, etc. so that she can provide better customer service while at the same time improve her sales which is her priority in order to move her home forward.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, ella se dedica a vender joyas y lociones,  con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas y con ayuda de su esposo logran cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, la clienta solicita un crédito para poder comprar mas mercadería y también para poder comprar ropa y zapatos pues tienen mucha demanda y asi puda surtir con mas productos su negocio para obtener mejores ganancias y seguir llevando el sustento diario a su hogar.
texts.en:
This client lives with her husband and daughter in her own house.  She works selling jewelry and lotions.  With profits earned from her sales and with her husband’s help they are able to cover some of the household expenses.
 
She’s requesting a loan to be able to buy more merchandise and also to buy clothes and shoes because they are in high demand and she can thus stock her business with more products to earn higher profits and continue to provide daily sustenance for her home.

loans.use: to buy jewelry, lotions, clothes and shoes.

loans.name: Jose Maria

texts.es: José vive con su esposa  y su hijo de 2 años de edad en casa de su propiedad y desde hace muchos años que se dedica a la agricultura la cual es su principal fuente de ingresos, siembra maíz y fríjol cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en sacos asi como muestra la fotografía, con lo que gana de sus cosechas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar. El quiere comprar los insumos necesarios para sus cosechas como abonos, fertilizantes, semillas pero dado que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para dicha inversión ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito ya que solo de esta forma puede continuar su proceso de cultivo. Al igual que todo campesino, deposita su confianza en la agricultura ya que no poseen otra fuente de ingresos y desea superarse haciendo lo mejor que puede en sus cultivos. Espera obtener una cosecha abundante que le permita seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar y cancelar dicho crédito
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and his two-year-old son in their own home. He has been farming for many years, and that is his main source of income. He grows corn and beans. When his harvest is ready, he stores it in sacks as shown in the photo. 

With what he earns from his harvests he manages to pay some of his household expenses. He wants to buy the necessary supplies for his crops, such as manure, fertilizers and seeds, but given that he doesn't have the financial resources necessary for this investment he has made the decision to request a loan, as only in this way can he continue farming. 

Like any farmer he places his trust in agriculture as he doesn't have another source of income. He wishes to succeed by doing the best he can with his crops. He hopes to get an abundant harvest, as this will allow him to continue supporting his household each day and to pay off this loan.

loans.use: To buy manure, fertilizers, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña María es comerciante, vive con sus 2 hijos de 20 y 14 años en casa propia, se dedica a la venta de medicina popular que vende de forma ambulante cerca de su lugar de residencia, gracias a las ventas que realiza y a la ayuda de su hijo han logrado solventar los gastos de su hogar. Doña María solicita un crédito para la compra de medicamentos por mayor y así poder seguir manteniendo su hogar y poder solventar los gastos que se le pueden presentar.
texts.en: María is a merchant and lives with her two children, ages 20 and 14, in her own house. She sells popular medicines as a street vendor in her neighborhood. Thanks to her sales and help from her son, she has managed to pay household expenses. María has applied for a loan to buy wholesale medicines so that she can keep supporting her family and meeting expenses as they occur.

loans.use: to buy wholesale medicines.

loans.name: Zebiniso

texts.ru: Зебинисо 40 лет. Она замужем  и все ее дети уже совершеннолетние. Она очень трудолюбивый человек и имеет более чем 20 лет опыта в бизнесе. Она занимается куплей продажей фруктов и овощей на местном рынке. Она является основной кормилицей в семье, так как ее муж без рабочий. Ее дочь скоро выходит замуж и Зебинисо нуждается больше дохода, так как проведение свадебного торжества требует много денег. В последнее время у нее мало клиентов, так как конкуренция большая. Она должна срочно расширить свой ассортимент для того, чтобы держать своих клиентов. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 6000 сомони для того, чтобы купить фрукты и овощи. Она надеется на вас и на вашу доброту.
texts.en: Zebiniso is 40 years old, married and all her children are already grown.  She is a hardworking person and has more than 20 years of experience in business.  She buys and sells fruits and vegetables at a local market.  She is the main breadwinner for her family since her husband is without work.  Her daughter is soon to be wed and Zebiniso needs more income since wedding celebrations cost much money.  Recently, she has had few clients because of tough competition.  She needs to immediately increase the variety of goods she sells to attract more customers.  She is asking for loan of 6,000 somoni to buy fruits and vegetables.  She relies on you and your kindness.

loans.use: To buy fruits and vegetables ti expand the selection of offered goods

loans.name: Filadelfia Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo “Filadelfia” conformada por 09 mujeres trabajadoras y  responsables que por medio de sus negocios buscan mejorar cada día. Alexandra de 34 años de edad es casada y tiene 03 hijos en etapa escolar. Siguiendo el ejemplo de su madre ya que también se dedicaba a dicha actividad Alexandra decide iniciar su propio negocio de la venta de comida rápida como alita broster, salchipapas y hamburguesas.  Se siente feliz pues gracias a su esfuerzo  puede apoyar con los gastos del hogar. Su mayor deseo es de poner una bodega, pues así asegura ella tendrá mayores ganancias. El crédito solicitado lo destinará para la compra de mesas y sillas, y de esta manera brindarles una mejor atención a sus comensales. El grupo “Filadelfia” agradecen el crédito brindado. Alexandra se encuentra en la parte posterior, es la cuarta del lado derecho y viste polo color celeste.
texts.en:
This is the “Filadelfia” group made up of nine hardworking and responsible women who, through their businesses, are looking to improve every day. 

Alexandra, 34, is married and has three children who are at school. Following her mother's example, who herself also made her living in this activity, Alexandra decided to start her own business selling fast food such as fried chicken, salchipapas and hamburgers. She feels happy as it is thanks to her efforts that she can help with the household costs. Her keenest desire is to own a grocery store as in this way she will have better profits. The loan sought will be allocated to buying tables and chairs, and in this way offer her guests a better service.

The “Filadelfia” group is grateful for the loan given. Alexandra is in the rear of the picture, she is the fourth from the right and is wearing a sky blue top.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs.

loans.name: Santos De Jesus

texts.es: Doña Santos vive junto a su compañero de vida en casa propia, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de frutas y verduras, fresas, plátanos, naranjas, tomates, cebollas, chiles entre otros tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el lugar donde comercia es muy estratégico para la actividad y además muy concurrido de personas, ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere porque su producto es fresco, a buen precio, de calidad y con un excelente servicio; Doña Santos es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor con muchas ganas de salir adelante, en las últimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar frutas y verduras por mayor.  Doña Santos tiene buenas referencias de pago, esta agradecida con el apoyo y asegura que podrá saldar la deuda, a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una vida mejor
texts.en:
Santos lives with her life companion in her own house.  She works buying and selling fruit and vegetables: strawberries, bananas, oranges, tomatoes, onions and chilies, among others.  She’s been in business for several years and she’s gained much sales experience that leads to the best profits.  The place where she sells is very strategic for this activity and many people come by there.  She has a large clientele that prefers her because her products are fresh, well-priced, good quality and service is excellent.

Santos is an enterprising woman who is dedicated to her work and who very much wants to get ahead.  In the last few weeks demand has increased so she wants to take advantage of it to make a new investment but lacks enough capital do back her up which is why she’s asking Integral for a loan that will make it possible for her to buy fruit and vegetables at wholesale.  Santos has good payment references and she’s grateful for the support; she assures that she’ll be able to repay the loan while at the same time trusts that she’ll give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables at wholesale.

loans.name: Hector Joel

texts.es: hector de 42 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus 3 hijos de 15, 6 y 2 años de edad, se dedica a vender productos artesanales  hechos de aluminio tiene mucha clientela pues los productos que el comercia son de muy buena calidad y aprecios accesibles, con las  ganancias que obtiene de sus  ventas logra cubrir los gastos de su hogar, hector esta solicitando un crédito para podre comprar mas productos por mayor como: cacerolas, ollas, sartenes, comales, etc. para obtener mas ganancias y poderle dar a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Hector is 42 years old and lives with his wife and their three children, who are fifteen, six, and two years old. He works selling products crafted from aluminum. He has a large customer base because the products he sells are very high quality and his prices are affordable. The profits he obtains from his sales allow him to cover his household expenses.

Hector is requesting a loan in order to buy more products wholesale, like pots, pans, griddles, etc. so that he can obtain higher profits and give his family more financial stability.

loans.use: to purchase more products wholesale, like pots, pans, griddles, etc.

loans.name: Yuri Dexenia

texts.es: Doña Yuri de 42 vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 8 y 5 años en casa propia; ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, está ubicado en el lugar de su residencia, es muy reconocida por los vecinos de la zona , se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, ella quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que tendrá una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Yuri is 42 and lives with her husband and their two children, ages 8 and 5, in their own home. She has a store where she sells basic necessities such as beans, milk, eggs, bread, and other items. 

She has many years in her business, and it has provided her with sales experience that allows her to get the best profits. Her store is located in her home and is very well known by people who live in the area. She has acquired a large clientele as she has the store well-stocked. 

She wants to see her business grow and carry out a new investment, but she needs capital. That is why she is requesting a loan that will allow her to buy what she needs for her store. She says that she will pay off the debt, and at the same time is confident that she will have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy rice, beans, milk, eggs, bread, etc.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es: Doña francisca, de 63 años, vive con su esposo en casa propia, ella es comerciante de frutas y verduras, tiene varios años de tener su negocio eso le ha dado la experiencia necesaria para poder tener su negocio, vende en el mercado que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia tiene mucha clientela pues vende a buen precio sus frutas y verduras, doña francisca solicita un prestamo para poder comprar zanahorias, tomates, cebollas, papa, sandias, guineos, etc. y todo lo que necesita para acrecentar su negocio y asi tener sus clientes satisfechos cuando la busquen para comprarle sus productos y ella podrá tener mejores ganancias que le ayudaran a darle a sus hijos una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Francisca, 63, lives with her husband in their own house. She has been selling fruits and vegetables for several years, which has given her the experience she needs to keep the business going. She sells at a local market and has many customers because she offers fruits and vegetables at good prices.

Francisca has applied for a loan to buy carrots, tomatoes, onions, potatoes, watermelons, bananas, and everything she needs to stock her business and satisfy her customers when they come to shop. She will have more profit, which will help her give her children a better life.

loans.use: to buy carrots, tomatoes, onions, potatoes, watermelons, bananas, etc.

loans.name: Mosafar

texts.ru: Мосафар 36 лет, замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Она очень трудолюбивый человек и имеет более чем 3 лет опыта в бизнесе. Она занимается купле продажей мороженного. Дополнительного она занимается купле продажей скота. Она покупает мороженное с центрального рынка и реализует в магазине, который находится в ее районе. Скот она выращивает в коровнике, который построила несколько лет назад. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 7500 сомони для того, чтобы мороженное. Она надеется на вас и на вашу доброту.
texts.en: Mosafar is 36 years old, married, and has four children.  She is a very hardworking person and has more than three years of experience in business.  She buys and resells ice cream.  Additionally, she also works selling livestock.  She buys ice cream at a central market and sells itin a store which is in her region.  She keeps her animals in a barn that she built a few years ago.  She is asking for a loan of 7,500 somoni to buy more ice cream.  She relies on you and your kindness.

loans.use: To buy new variety of fabrics to increase working capital

loans.name: Pedro Julio

texts.es: Don Pedro de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica a la reparación de todo tipo de aparatos y electrodomésticos,  tiene mucha clientela pues repara muy bien los artículos que los clientes le llegan a dejar, con las ganancias que obtiene de su trabajo logar solventar los gastos de su hogar, don Pedro solicita un crédito para poder comprar diferentes repuestos para los electrodomésticos y seguir con su trabajo ara llevar el pan diario a su casa.
texts.en:
Pedro, 46, lives with his wife in his own house.  He works repairing all types of devices and electric home appliances.  He has a large clientele because he repairs the appliances his customers bring in quite well.  Pedro uses profits obtained from his work to cover his household expenses.  

Pedro is asking for a loan to be able to buy various appliance spare parts to continue working and providing daily bread for his home.

loans.use: to buy various spare parts for appliances.

loans.name: Alba Del Socorro

texts.es:
Alba de 51 años de edad, es una mujer apasionada por su trabajo y familia. Asegura que desde su juventud el arte de la belleza, se convirtió en su mayor objetivo por alcanzar, de modo que inició estudiando en una academia corte y cepillado. Posteriormente logró montar su salón de bellaza el cual es su fuente de ingresos. Gracias al desarrollo de su actividad ha podido brindarles a sus dos hijos menores de edad educación y alimento.
Sueña con mejorar sus condiciones de vida y garantizarles acceso a la  educación superior a sus hijos. 
En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de un tocador y una mesa de manicure, con el fin de mejorar la calidad en el servicio y aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en: Alba, 51, is a woman who is passionate about her work and her family.  She says that the goal she’s had since she was young was to work in the beauty field.  To do so, she started taking courses at a haircut and styling academy.  Later on she managed to open her beauty salon which is her source of income.   Thanks to the business’ development she’s been able to provide her two minor children with food and schooling.  She dreams with improving her children’s quality of life and guaranteeing them access to higher education.  She’s currently applying for a loan she’ll use to buy a dressing table and a manicure table aiming at improving the quality of service and to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy a manicure table and a dressing table.

loans.name: Raisa

texts.ru:
Раисе 66 лет, вдова. Раиса в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством и продажей молока, стартовав в 1993 году с  покупки скота на сумму 5,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Раисы в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  1 бычок и 1 дойная корова, ежемесячный доход составляет 8, 000 сом (KGS). 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Раиса  обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS)  на увеличение поголовья скота за счет покупки одной дойной коровы.  Доходы от кредита Раиса планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, в будущем планирует копить деньги для внука.
texts.en: Raisa is 66 years old and a widow.  She works with cattle and sells milk.  She started this business in 1993, buying one dairy cow for 5,000 somoni.  This business is the main source of income for her family.  Thanks to her hard work, today she has one bull, one dairy cow, and her monthly income is 8,000 somoni.  With the goal of further developing her business, Raisa has turned to the microfinance bank Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 60,000 somoni to buy an additional dairy cow.  Raisa plans to use the income from the loan to further increase her herd.  She also plans to save for her grandson.

loans.use: to puchase cattle

loans.name: Alba Ruth

texts.es:
Alba de 44 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos hijos. Trabajó en como administradora de un almacén por más de cinco años, pero decidió retirarse y con sus ahorros dio inicio a su plan de negocios. Abrió una tienda dedicada a la venta de artículos para la confección tale como botones, cintas, hilos, franjas entre otros. Con lo cual ha sacado adelante a su familia brindándoles educación y vivienda. 
En la actualidad sueña con seguir creciendo dentro del mercado local, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando  un crédito para la compra de dos vitrinas y surtido con el fin de aumentar su nivel de venats.
texts.en: Alba, 44, is a single mother of two children. She worked as a store manager for more than five years but decided to retire and use her savings to start her own business plan.  She opened a store that sells sewing supplies like buttons, ribbons, thread and fringe, among others.  She’s supported her family this way providing them with schooling and housing.  She currently dreams with continuing to grow in the local marketplace which is why she’s asking for a loan to buy two display cases and stock merchandise to increase her level of sales.

loans.use: to buy a display case and inventory.

loans.name: Amparo Del Socorro

texts.es:
Amparo de 54 años de edad, es un guerrera, que después de separarse de su cónyuge vio como oportunidad de negocio alquilar habitaciones en su residencia debido al tamaño de su vivienda, de esta manera se ha ganado la vida y le ofreció a su hijo educación. En la actualidad uno de los baños de las habitaciones presenta inconvenientes por lo cual requiere de algunas reparaciones, razón que la ha motivado a solicitar un crédito ya que no cuenta con los recursos para realizar dicha inversión.
Espera mejorar su condición económica y garantizarles a sus clientes una adecuada prestación del servicio.
texts.en: Amparo, 54, is a warrior who after separating from her spouse noted that the size of her house gave her the opportunity of renting rooms at home.  She’s earned her livelihood this way and was able to school her son.  At present, one of the room’s bathrooms is damaged and needs repairs which is what’s motivated her to request a loan since she does not have the resources for said investment.  She hopes to improve her economic situation and guarantee her customers adequate service.

loans.use: to repair the bathrooms.

loans.name: María

texts.es: María Belén tiene 53 años de edad y desde hace 20 años quedó viuda. En búsqueda de alternativas para el sostenimiento de su familia compuesta por tres hijos, María decidió dedicarse a la decoración y venta de cerámicas, habilidad que desarrolló desde su infancia y juventud. En la actualidad tiene un taller de manualidades desde su vivienda, en el cual dicta clases varios días a la semana. Con el fin de abrir su negocio al público, María se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de insumos y adecuaciones locativas, con el fin de darse a conocer y adquirir un mayor número de clientes, lo que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y crecer dentro del mercado local.
texts.en:
María Belén is 53 years old, and was left a widow 20 years ago. Seeking alternatives for supporting her family comprised of three children, Maria decided to start a business decorating and selling ceramics. This is a skill she developed from a very young age.  

Currently she has a craft workshop in her home, where she gives classes several days a week. In order to open her business to the public, Maria is seeking a loan that she will use to buy materials and to make on-site improvements. Her aim is to become better known and acquire a greater number of customers. This will allow her to improve her quality of life and grow within the local market.

loans.use: To buy materials and make on-site improvements for her ceramics business.

loans.name: Nohemy Isabel

texts.es:
Nohemy de 41 años de edad, es una mujer que tiene claro que la estabilidad de su familia es un tema que no solo le compete a su esposo, si no del que ella también hace parte, por lo cual decidió ayudarle a su cónyuge con la carga familiar e inició vendiendo productos para el hogar como ventiladores, sanducheras, ollas arroceras entre otros. Actividad que realiza desde su vivienda y le permite mejorar los ingresos. Gracias al desarrollo de esta actividad, sus hijos gozan de mejores oportunidades educativas.
En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de surtido con el fin de satisfacer la demanda actual y seguir creciendo dentro del mercado local.
texts.en: Nohemy, 41, recognizes that her family's stability depends not only on her husband's participation, but also on hers. So she decided to help her husband in supporting the family and began selling housewares such as fans, grills, pans, and crock pots from her home to earn money. Thanks to the business, her children have better education opportunities. She has applied for a loan to buy inventory to meet current demand and continue growing her share of business in the local market.

loans.use: to buy housewares.

loans.name: Mamurjon

texts.ru: Мамуржон житель города Кургантюбе Хатлонской области Таджикистана. Ему 25 лет. Он женат и имеет одну дочь. Жена домохозяйка, а дочь ходит в детский сад. Мамуржон намерен начать новый бизнес и заняться производством пластиковых окон, дверей и перегородков. Он уже арендовал место для деятельности и закупил оборудования. Теперь, чтобы начать бизнес ему необходимы денежные средства для приобретения пластикового материала для производства. С этой целью он обратился за кредитом и очень ждет поддержки.
texts.en: Mamurjon lives in Qurgan-Tube in Khatlon province of Tajikistan.  He is 25 years old.  He is married and has one daughter.  His wife is a homemaker and his daughter goes to preschool.  Mamurjon is determined to start a new business and to start making plastic windows, doors and walls.  He already rented a spot for his business and purchased equipment.  Now, in order to start working he needs financial resources to purchase plastic for manufacturing.  With this goal he applied for a loan and is looking forward to your support.

loans.use: to buy plastic material to manufacture windows and doors

loans.name: Beatriz Amparo

texts.es:
Beatriz, es una joven de 23 años de edad, quien se dedica a la elaboración de accesorios en murano y plata. Actividad que aprendió por tradición familiar. Su madre cuenta con un almacén el cual ella aprovecha para comercializar sus productos. 
Gracias a esta actividad, Beatriz paga sus estudios universitarios y le colabora a su madre con los gastos del hogar. Se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de un soldador de plata y mercancía con el fin de mejorar la calidad de sus productos y aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Beatriz is a young 23-year-old who works making accessories out of silver and glass beads.  She learned this activity through family tradition.  Her mother has a store that she avails herself of to sell her products.  

Thanks to this activity, Beatriz is able to pay for her university courses and helps her mother with household expenses.  She’s requesting a loan to buy a soldering iron for silver and other merchandise needed in order to improve the quality of her products and to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy a soldering iron for silver and other crafts-making supplies.

loans.name: Rigoberto De Jesús

texts.es:
Rigoberto, desde hace 12 años es productor agrícola de la vereda el Llano del municipio de Santa Elena, Colombia. Aprendió el oficio por tradición familiar y actualmente se dedica al cultivo de fresas y tomates bajo invernadero. Labora diariamente de 5:00 am a 5:00 pm.  Gracias a su actividad, su familia goza de mejores condiciones de vida. 
Con el fin de sacar una mejor cosecha y aumentar sus ingresos, Rigoberto se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de insumos agrícolas como semillas y abonos, lo que le permitirá mejorar la calidad de vida en su hogar.
texts.en:
Rigoberto has been farming in the village of el Llano, Santa Elena, Colombia for the past 12 years.  He learned how to farm from his family and currently grows greenhouse strawberries and tomatoes.  He works every day, from 5.00am to 5.00pm.  Thanks to his business, his family enjoy better living conditions.

With the aim of achieving a better harvest and increasing his income, Rigoberto is requesting a loan to invest in buying farming inputs such as seeds and compost.  This will allow him to improve his household's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy farming inputs such as seeds and compost

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es:
Rocío, ha dedicado toda su vida a laborar en el campo en compañía de sus tres hijos y su esposo. Cerca de su vivienda posee un galpón de pollos de engorde, los cuales comercializa en el pueblo, actividad que alterna con la cría de cerdos, debido a que es un negocio rentable. Con el fin de seguir con el desarrollo de las dos actividad hades, Roció se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de lechones y concentrado con el fin aumentar su producción y mejorar los ingresos del hogar. 
Su mayor deseo es poderles brindar a sus tres hijos mejores condiciones de vida y acceso a la educación superior.
texts.en: Rocío has been working in agriculture her whole life with her three children and husband. Near her home she has a chicken coupe that she fattens and then sells in his town, an activity that she complements with raising pigs, because the latter is a profitable business. With the goal of developing both of these activities, Rocío is asking for a credit that she will invest in purchasing pigs and feed in order to increase her production and to improve her earnings. Her biggest desire is to be able to offer her three children a better quality of life and access to higher education.

loans.use: purchase pigs and feed.

loans.name: Rodrigo De Jesús

texts.es:
Rodrigo, de 69 años de edad, tiene una tienda dedicada a la venta de productos de la canasta familiar desde hace más de 18 años, Vivió la mayor parte de su vida en el campo pero debido a la precaria situación económica por la que atravesaron se vieron en la obligación de trasladarse a la ciudad donde inició con su actividad comercial. Labora diariamente de 6:00 am a 8:00 pm. Gracias a su actividad ha logrado sacar su familia adelante y brindarle una estabilidad económica. 
Sueña seguir creciendo en el sector, ampliar su tienda en un gran mercado autoservicio y convertirse en una fuente de empleo para su comunidad, razón por la cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de productos de la canasta familiar.
texts.en:
69-year-old Rodrigo has a store where he has been selling basic household products for more than 18 years.  He lived most of his life in the countryside but, owing to the precarious financial situation in which his family found themselves, they were forced to move to the city where he set up his store.  Rodrigo works every day, from 6.00am to 8.00pm.  Thanks to his business, he has been able to provide for his family and offer them financial stability.

Rodrigo dreams of continuing to grow his business.  He would like to expand his store so that it becomes a source of employment for his community.  He is requesting this loan to buy basic groceries for his store.

loans.use: to buy basic household products

loans.name: Anthorium Group

texts.en:
Venancia is married and has six children. She lives in Balintawak, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur.

Venancia has a garden that grows different kinds and colors of flowers. She has been doing this for 18 years to earn a living. She has requested a loan to purchase fertilizers for her flower business.  Venancia has been a member of PMPC for almost six years. In the future, Venancia wants to sell her flowers in different areas within the city.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for her flower business

location.town: Pagadian - Balintawak, Aurora, Zamboanga Del Sur

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is married with three children. He also takes care of his deceased brother's children, who are all in primary school. He lives in Ikinu division, Githunguri district, Kiambu county, in Central Kenya. 

He is a hardworking farmer practicing dairy farming together with tea farming on his two-acre piece of land. Proceeds from this work have enabled him to cater for his family's needs and pay for the children's school fees.

Having attended one of the trainings organized by Visionary Empowerment Programme, he learned that he could save a lot of money on fuel by having a biodigester at his home. The biogas will be used for cooking and lighting. Every month he spends around $25 to buy kerosene and charcoal for cooking and lighting. This is not only costly for him but also tiresome, as the market is six kilometers away from his home. With biogas, this money can be saved. He has applied for a Kiva loan to facilitate the construction of a biodigester.

loans.use: To purchase a biodigester

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en:
This is Miriam, 35, resident of Silang, Cavite, Philippines. She is a widow with two children, both in elementary school. She manages her household while operating the business. She works hard to provide income for their everyday needs.

Miriam maintains a direct selling business. She sells clothing, footwear, undergarments, cosmetics and other products through the popular direct selling brands like Avon, Fuller life, Natasha, Boardwalk, Marikina Shoe Exchange, and other direct selling brands. A customer's order is bought in cash by the dealer and then given to the customer with a one-month-to-pay credit. Dealer’s prices are lower than those in the catalog, and these are the profits that dealers are investing as their income. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of Php2000 in sales every week.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Ph10,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy additional supplies and merchandise products like shampoo, cologne, deodorant, perfume, soap, fabric softener, undergarments and other products needed in her business. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Miriam hopes that her business will continue to grow and dreams to give her children a good life and education. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional supplies and merchandise products like clothing, footwear, undergarments, and cosmetics needed in her business.

loans.name: Bernadeth

texts.en:
Bernadeth is 59 years old and lives in Imelda, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married and has three children. Bernadeth is a dress maker and earns approximately 8000Php each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to purchase more equipment for her tailoring business.
Bernadeth has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Bernadeth hopes to expand her store.

loans.use: to purchase more equipment for her tailoring business

loans.name: Digna

texts.en: Digna of Gango, Ozamiz City is a 39 year-old woman who is married and has seven children. To earn a living, she owns and manages a tricycle, extending transportation services in the local community. She has been in this business for five years with an income of 4,000Php a month.  That cannot support all their basic needs. In 2009, she became a member of GDMPC micro credit to gain access to micro finance. Currently, she is borrowing 9,500 from the cooperative to repair the existing tricycle for better services. She dreams of having another tricycle to have multiple earnings in the future.

loans.use: to repair a transport vehicle used in the business

loans.name: Pearly

texts.en:
This is Pearly. She previously requested a 10,000 PHP loan that she used to buy spare parts, accessories and paid for the maintenance of their tricycle unit. Her earnings were a big help in their personal, house hold and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 10,000 PHP loan for her to buy spare parts and for the maintenance repairs of their tricycle unit. Her profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain her family's daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Pearly dreams that her business will expand. She meets up every week with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business and to also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for spare parts and maintenance of their tricycle unit.

loans.name: Meriam

texts.en: Meriam is 58 years old, married and living in Tabid, Ozamis City. She has 4 children. She earns a living through providing sound system rentals. She has been doing this for 10 years and earns 4,000 PHP a month from this work. Meriam has applied for a loan of 4,500 PHP at GDMPC to buy accessories and lights to provide better service to her customers. She has been a member of GDMPC since 2010. She hopes to improve her business and to have a better living in the future.

loans.use: to buy accessories and lights for better services

loans.name: Marciana

texts.en:
Marciana is married and has 12 children. Marciana is 44 years old and lives in Molos, Tampilisan, Zamobanga del Norte.
Marciana grows pigs to earn a living. She has been doing this for 15 years. She has requested a loan to purchase feed for her pigs.
Marciana has been a member of PMPC for 4 years. In the future, Marciana hopes to have more pigs.

loans.use: to purchase feed for her pigs

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is married and a father of three children. Two are in primary school and one is in secondary school. He lives in Muranga county in central Kenya. He runs a small retail kiosk and also practices dairy farming, from which he earns money to meet family's needs.

He spends $1 every day on kerosene and firewood -- significant costs to him and his family. He has recently learned about biogas construction from Visionary Empowerment Programme's training program, and he wants to take a loan for a biodigester, which will produce fuel for both cooking and lighting. He believes this technology will help him to save money. Savings from the fuel and kerosene purchases, along with profits from his kiosk and milk sales, will enable him repay the loan.

loans.use: to purchase a biodigester

loans.name: Ainura

texts.ru:
Айнуре 42 года, имеет 2 детей - школьников. Айнура в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством и полеводством, унаследовав традиционную для своей семьи деятельность. Стартовав с суммы 3,000 сом, благодаря упорному труду Айнура на сегодняшний день имеет 2 дойные коровы в приплодом, 40 овец и 2 лошади, ее прибыль составляет (KGS) 8,000 сом в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айнура  обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 135,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку мелкого рогатого скота.  Доходы от кредита Айнура  планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, чтобы иметь возможность обучить детей после окончания  школы.
texts.en:
Ainura is 42 years old and has 2 school-aged children.  Ainura, as a main source of income fom her family, raises livestock and farms, having inherited her family's traditional business.  She started with a sum of 3,000 som, thanks to her hard work, today, Ainura has 2 milk cows with offspring, 40 sheep, and 2 horses, her earnings are 8,000 som (KGS) per month.

In order to further grow her business, Ainura turned to the Microfinance bank, "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan of 135,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of small horned livestock.  Ainura plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further growing her business in order to be able to give her children an education after they graduate from school.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en: Tessie lives in the village where the primary source of living is rice farming. She and her husband are also in that activity. They have been doing it for almost ten yearns now. With the desire to make that business even more productive, Tessie wants a loan amounting to P20,000. If granted, this amount will serve as additional capital for buying fertilizers and pesticides for her rice plants. Tessie hopes that through the amount, her yield will increase, which will also result in a higher profit.  She believes that with a higher profit she will be able to send her three children for a college education.

loans.use: buying fertilizers and pesticides for her rice plants

loans.name: Florencia

texts.en: Florencia is 49 years old and lives in Comunal, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married and has 9 children.  Florencia works in the fish industry for a living. She has been doing this for 13 years. She has requested a loan to purchase more fish to sell.  Florencia has been a member of PMPC for 1 year. In the future, Florencia hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell

loans.name: Rosildes

texts.en:
Rosildes is married and has 5 children. Rosildes is 60 years old and lives in Poblacion, Tampilisan, Zamboanga del Norte.

Rosildes operates a general store to earn a living and has had this business for 1 year. Each month, she earns 2000 PHP doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase more stock for her general store such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap, and canned goods.

Rosildes has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, Rosildes hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap, and canned goods.

loans.name: Uranzaya

texts.en: Uranzaya, 24 years old, lives with her husband in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. The couple resides in their own house on a plot of land. In 2012, she and her husband purchased land and an old brick house. They have been working at a building company for three years and both are considered to be good workers by their superiors. Her husband is senior member of a brigade which executes construction work in various places. She is requesting a loan of 6,500,000 MNT to purchase bricks, gypsum, wallpaper and fiberglass. Using her purchased materials, she and her husband can repair and insulate their house which has a deteriorated outer appearance and vulnerable walls. The renovated house will enable the couple to burn less coal, emit less smoke and then contribute to the efforts against air pollution. The borrower is very hardworking individual who strives for better future.

loans.use: to purchase bricks, gypsum, wallpaper and fiberglass

loans.name: Sebio

texts.en: Sebio, is 43 years old, and a local farmer in the simple place of Barangay Centro 1. He manages 2 hectares of corn field. In order to purchase all of his farming needs such as seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, insecticides as well as to pay for the manpower wages, Sebio is requesting a loan amount of  35,000 PHP. He is an example of a hard working father of six children, Sebio also helps his wife in her buy and sell business of banana products. According to him he really wants to provide the needs of his children which is why he is working double time.

loans.use: to purchase all of his farming needs such as seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, insecticides as well as to pay for the manpower wages

loans.name: Say

texts.en:
Say is a 44-year-old married woman, who lives with her family of four (her huband, two children, and her younger brother) in Prey Chor district of Kompong Cham province. Say started s farming busines when she was with her parents. Having been in the business for years, Say gained valuable experience which allows her to be a professional in her occupation and maintain fruitful harvest each harvest season. Aside from a farming business, Say works together with her husband to produce granite motars and pestles to earn more income for her family.

Say is requesting a loan of $1,500 USD, which she will use to buy spare parts and equipment for her younger brother's motorbike repair shop. Say believes that this loan will improve his business and increase his profits and will give him the ability to start a new family with a better financial situation.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and equipment for her younger brother's motorbike repair shop

loans.name: Mary Galla

texts.en:
Mary Galla is 47 years old and lives in Tuburan, Pagadian City, Philippines. She is married with four children.

Marry Galla has a general store that sells goods and dry goods. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan to purchase more stock for her general such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap and canned goods.

Mary Galla has been a member of PMPC for six years. In the future, she hopes to build a big store.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap and canned goods...

location.town: Pagadian-Tuburan, Pagadian City Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Vinh

texts.en:
Vinh was born in 1981. She has a son and a daughter; one is learning at primary school and one is still little. Her husband is a guard. His income is about 3,000,000 VND. 

Vinh sells clothes to earn a living. She earns 4,000,000 VND per month. She has done this job for eight years. Her family’s total earnings are about 7,000,000 VND per month. 

Vinh has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2005. In the last cycle she borrowed 9,810,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,810,000 VND to sell more clothes in her store. She always wants to raise her children up well and have more money for her business.

loans.use: to sell more clothes in her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for fabric, cloth, thread and other materials needed in her business.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en: Virginia is requesting a $600 loan to buy additional supplies for her restaurant, including meat and vegetables. She started her restaurant in 2011, and has been earning a good income from it. Virginia is happy with the loan that she is taking. She wants to open a big restaurant in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional supplies for her restaurant, including meat and vegetables.

loans.name: Arturo

texts.en: Arturo is a 41-year-old married man with two children living in Proper Langcangan, Oroquieta City. He owns and operates an insurance company in the local community. Recently he joined GDMPC to gain access to microfinance and now is requesting a loan of 15,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to purchase a set of computers for his insurance company. He dreams of expanding his business to another locality.

loans.use: to purchase a set of computers to be used for the business

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
Sandra de 40 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, ama su familia y considera que esta es el pilar fundamental que la impulsa cada día a ir en búsqueda de mejores oportunidades. En la actualidad se dedica a la venta de mercancía como ropa, accesorios y cosméticos, Actividad que le genera los ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia. 
Con el fin de aumentar su nivel de ventas y cumplir con algunos encargos, se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de mercancía, lo que le permitirá garantizarles a sus tres hijos una educación de calidad.
texts.en: Sandra is 40 years old and an entrepreneur who has a desire to be successful and love her family, something she considers a fundamental pillar that pushes her everyday to go in search of better opportunities. Currently, she is dedicated to selling merchandise such as clothing, accessories and cosmetics, and activity that generates earnings to support her family. With the goal of increasing her sales and to fulfill some orders, she is looking for a credit that she will invest in purchasing merchandise, which will allow her to promise her three children a quality education.

loans.use: purchase clothing, accessories and cosmetics.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
This is Julieta, 49, a resident of Silang, Cavite Philippines. She is married to Gregorio, a driver, and is a mother to their children. She and her husband manage their own household. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.  

Julieta oversees and owns operations of their tricycle transportation business. They have one tricycle that carries up to four passengers to their destination within the community. The tricycle driver then remits a boundary (daily quota) each day to Julieta. In her business, the regular customers are the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 500 every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, Julieta is requesting a PHP 8,000 loan. She will use the loan to buy spare parts, accessories and also for the maintenance of their tricycle. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Julieta hopes to have another tricycle and dreams that her children will finish their studies. She meets up every week with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for spare parts and maintenance of their tricycle unit.

loans.name: Elpedia

texts.en: Elpedia is 54 years old, married and has six children.  She lives in Cabungaan, Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Elpedia owns farmland, planting bananas and coconuts to earn a living.  She has been in this business for ten years and earns 5,000 PHP each month. Elpedia has been a member of  GDMPC since 2009 and has requested a loan of 11,000 PHP in order to purchase fertilizer such as manure. In the future, Elpedia hopes to improve her family’s general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Judith's Group

texts.en:
Judith is the leader of a 5 person group. Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

Judith is married and has 2 children. Judith is 61 years old and lives in Bagalupa, Labangan, Zamboanga del Sur.

Judith sells dry goods to earn a living and has had this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns 40,000 PHP doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for 25,000 PHP to purchase inventory to sell in her store.

Judith has a member of PMPC for less than a year. In the future, Judith hope to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase products to sell in her store

location.town: Pagadian - Bagalupa, Labangan, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is a 36-year-old married woman who lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She has two children to care for. She has been engaged in providing manicure and pedicure services for five years to earn a living. She earns a monthly income of 3,200 PHP from this job. 

Rosalinda is requesting a loan of 8,000 PHP from GDMPC to purchase manicure and pedicure accessories for her business. She hopes to earn more income to ensure a better future for her family in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase manicure and pedicure accessories

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
This is Rowena, 42, a resident of Silang, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Macario, a driver and is a mother to her children. She and her husband are managing their household while operating the business. They are working hand in hand to provide income for their everyday expenses.

Rowena owns and oversees operations of their jeepney (see footnote) transportation business. She has a one unit (14-16 person capacity) jeepney, from which she receives a boundary (daily quota) each day. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 1,000 every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 10,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy spare parts and pay for the maintenance of her jeepney unit. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.

Rowena hopes to have additional jeepney for her growing business and dreams of having a good and peaceful life. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her life and business every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

-Curiously, Jeepneys have purely American origins. They were first used by American soldiers helping the Philippines throw off the invading Japanese. Filipino ingenuity, however, managed to see this vehicle as an opportunity to earn, and modified the Jeep into a 20-seater jeepney, open enough to provide adequate ventilation, sturdy for every day travel, and cheap enough to buy and maintain. Now, the jeepneys are one of the things that makes the Philippines truly the Philippines.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for the spare parts and maintenance of their jeepney unit.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as fertilizers and corn seedlings.

loans.name: Mariano Jr.

texts.en: Mariano Jr. is a vegetable farmer from the town of Bohol, Philippines. He is a married man and a father of two children. Mariano Jr. has been in the business for more than five years now. Mariano Jr. is asking for a loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer. Through this loan, he will be able to plant more and increase his harvest. In the future, Mariano Jr. dreams of making his farming business a success so that it will generate more income necessary for the needs of the family, especially for the schooling of his children.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer.

loans.name: Bernardo

texts.en:
Bernardo is is a 57-year-old married man. He has ten children and lives in San Jose with his family. He is a farmer, growing crops like corn and rice. He has been in agriculture since 2007, and he works six days a week. Every day he works seven hours in the farm. 

He sells his products to traders from their town. He hopes to be the leading supplier of agriculture products in his area, if he gets enough capital to invest in the business. 

He has applied for this loan to buy pesticides and fertilizers for his crops. His major challenges are the weather, which is unpredictable, and acquiring pesticides, which are quite expensive. He also lacks sufficient capital for large-scale growing.

loans.use: to buy pesticides and fertilizers for his crops.

loans.name: Lan

texts.en: Lan is 54 years old and widowed with a son. She has been running a grocery store to sell fruit for 25 years. She started this business to cover her expenses and to generate income to raise her son. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Lan is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying more kinds of fruit to sell. This will enable her to attract more customers and increase the turnover of her business. She hopes that through the loan, she will be able to expand her business activities and have money to reinvest in her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy fruit to sell

loans.name: Sevarniso

texts.ru:
Севарнисо 25лет, воспитывает одного ребенка. Севарнисо  работает преподавателем кыргызского языка с местной школе и в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи,  занимается животноводством , стартовав 5 лет назад  с суммы 9,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду,  Севарнисо на сегодняшний день имеет прибыль (KGS) 13,000 сом в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Севарнисо обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота.  Доходы от кредита Севарнисо планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, чтобы иметь возможность достойно обеспечивать свою семью.
texts.en: Sevarniso is 25 years old and raising one child.  Sevarniso works as a Kyrgyz language teacher at a school and, to provide an additional source of income for her family, is involved in animal husbandry, having started five years ago with a sum of 9,000 som.  Thanks to her persistent work, today she has a profit of 13,000 som (KGS) per month.  In order to further develop her business, Sevarniso requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the micro-finance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" to buy livestock.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a further growth of her business in order to have an ability to provide well for her family.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Sor Liliana

texts.es:
Sor, es una joven a la que le ha tocado luchar incansablemente para obtener mejores condiciones de vida, lo que es y lo que tiene lo ha construido a pulso con esfuerzo y mucho sacrificio. 
Laboró en varios restaurantes de su localidad, pero desde hace siete meses decidió independizarse y montar su propio negocio dedicado a la venta de comidas rápidas, bebidas y dulces con el fin de mejorar su condición económica y brindarle a su madre una mejor calidad de vida. Asegura que el negocio ha tenido una buena acogida por parte de la comunidad, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de surtido y una nevera para la conservación de los alimentos, mejorando la rentabilidad y el servicio.
Sueña con seguir creciendo dentro del sector y montar más puntos de venta.
texts.en: Sor is a young woman who fights tirelessly to give herself a better quality of life, what she has, she has made herself, through hard work and sacrifice. She has worked in various restaurants in her neighborhood, but seven months ago, she decided to branch out on her own and to start her own business where she sells fast food, drinks and sweets. Her goal is to improve her economic situation and to give her mother a better quality of life. She assures us that her business has been welcomed by the community and, so, she is asking for a credit that she will invest in the purchase of supplies and a refrigerator so she can conserve her foods and improve the profitability and service of her business. Her dream is to continue to grow her business and to open new locations.

loans.use: purchase supplies and a refrigerator.

loans.name: Rosevilla

texts.en:
Rosevilla is from Gango, Ozamis City. She is 40 years old, married and has four children. To make a living, Rosevilla owns a transportation services business in the local community. She has been engaged in her business for three years and earns 2,000 PHP a month. 

In 2009, Rosevilla joined GDMPC. She is now requesting a loan of 15,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase a transport vehicle to improve the business. 

She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a transport vehicle to improve the business.

loans.name: Jenemar's Group

texts.en:
Jenemar is the group leader of a five-person group. Although they borrow as a group, each member has her own business.

Jenemar is 28 years old and lives in Bagalupa, Labangan, Zamboanga del Sur. She is married with 2 children. Jenemar has a store that sells dry goods. She has had this business for 4 years, and is requesting a loan to buy additional dry goods to sell.

Jenemar has been a member of PMPC for less than a year. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase dry goods

location.town: Pagadian - Bagalupa, Labangan, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Pearl Grace

texts.en: Pearl Grace of Carmen Annex, Ozamiz City is a 34-year-old woman who is married with three little children. To earn a living, she owns a sari-sari store selling dry goods in the local community with an income of 10,000 PHP monthly. In 2011, she became a member of GDMPC and is requesting a loan of 11,000 PHP to purchase additional products to sell. She always dreams of expanding to a bigger general store in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

location.town: Carmen Annex, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Germelina's Group

texts.en:
Germelina is 58 years old and lives in Poblacion, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 7 children. Germelina is engaged in the dried fish vending business and earns approximately PHP 2,000.00 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing construction materials for house repair.

Germelina has been a member of PMPC for almost 10 years. In the future, Germelina hopes to expand her business. Germelina is the leader of a 2 person group. Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Gold Center Group

texts.en:
Porsosa is 45 years old and lives in Dao Pagadian City Philippines. She is married with 3 children.

Porsosa has had a bag-making business for 15 years and earns approximately 20,000 each month doing this type of work. She requested a loan to purchase more stock for her bag-making business.

Porsosa has been a member for 5 years. In the future, she hopes to build a big shop.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her bag-making business.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is 50 years old and lives in Baga, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 4 children.

Nida is engaged in the coconut buying and selling business and earns approximately PHP 1,000.00 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional coconuts for her copra and nut-selling business.

Nida has been a member of PMPC for almost 2 years. In the future, Nida hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional coconuts for copra and nut selling.

loans.name: Nelly's Group

texts.en:
Nelly is 53 years old and lives in Butuay, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 4 children.

Nelly is engaged in curtain-making and dressmaking activities and earns approximately PHP 1,200.00 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional cloth and accessories for her curtain-making and dressmaking activities.

Nelly has been a member of PMPC for 10 years. In the future, Nelly hopes to expand her business. Nelly is the leader of a 2-person group. Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loans.use: to purchase additional cloth and accessories.

loans.name: Filomena

texts.en:
Filomena is applying for a loan of $1,000 USD from TRM (Tuba Rai Metin). She is 38 years old, married and has 5 children.  She is running a kiosk in front of her house and she will use the loan to buy stock to keep in her store such as Hard drinks (beer),soft drinks (Fanta, Coca-Cola, Sprite, Sagiko) eggs,  oil, sugar, biscuits and rice. She is making good money from selling and she wants to apply for a bigger loan in the future. 

Filomena is living in a town near by the school.  Her kiosk is located in strategic place where many people come to buy including students, and she is happy with (TRM Tuba Rai Metin) that offers loans to poor people. Her husband is a farmer.

loans.use: to buy hard drinks (beer), soft drinks (Fanta, Coca-Cola, Sprite, Sagiko) eggs, oil, sugar, biscuits and rice

loans.name: Felomina

texts.en:
Felomina is 47 years old and lives in Tabo-o, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has five children.  Felomina is engaged in a carinderia business (eatery) and earns approximately PHP3,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional meat, rice and other ingredients for her existing business. 
Felomina has been a member of PMPC for five years. In the future, Felomina hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional meat, rice and other ingredients

loans.name: Clara Yohana

texts.es: Clara a sus 29 años de edad, se visiona como una gran empresaria, desde hace cinco años se dedica al diseño y fabricación de calzado desde su hogar. Actividad que aprendió gracias a su padre quien laboró por muchos años en la actividad. Con el fin de cumplir con los pedidos hechos por sus clientes, Clara se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de insumos como cuero, tela, pegante, entre otros. Con esta inversión podrá aumentar sus ventas y generar mayores ingresos con el fin de brindarle a su hija de 12 años de edad una buena educación y mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Clara, 29, sees herself as sees herself as a great entrepreneur.  She has designed and made footwear from her home for five years.  She learned the job thanks to her father, who worked for many years in that field.

Clara's requesting a loan to invest in buying leather, fabric, glue, and other supplies so she can fill her customers' orders.  With this investment she'll be able to increase her sales and generate greater income so she can give her 12-year-old daughter a good education and better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy leather, fabric, and glue

loans.name: Joselito

texts.en:
Joselito is a 46-year-old man from the town of Bien Unido, Bohol. He has been engaged in the water-refilling business for more than two years now. This is his source of income.

Joselito is asking for a loan to buy more water gallons for his water-refilling business. He hopes to make his venture a success .

loans.use: to buy more water gallons.

loans.name: Althiane

texts.en: Althiane is a 41-year-old married woman with four children living in Taboo, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She has been selling fish in the local community for 5 years, earning PHP 2,500 a month for a living. In 2011, Althiane joined GDMPC micro credit to gain financial access and is now requesting a loan of PHP 3,000 to purchase additional variety of fish to sale. She dreams to send her children to school and would finish their study.

loans.use: to purchase additional variety of fish to sale

loans.name: Sreyda

texts.en:
Sreyda, 24, is from a rural village located in the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. She and her husband earn a living by growing rice on seven hectares of farmland. In this business for 10 years, they earn about 32,000 KHR per day.

New to VisionFund, Sreyda is requesting a loan of 2,500,000 KHR to buy fertilizer and rice seeds for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to grow her rice on time so as to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and rice seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en: Violeta, a 59-year-old woman, is married with 3 children and lives in Hinagdong, Ozamiz City. To earn a living, she buys and sells seaweed and also has a store. She has been in this business for 5 years and earns 4,000 a month. This year, she joined GDMPC and then requested a loan of 5,000.00 PHP to purchase additional inventory and to have additional working capital. She plans to improve her store and repair their house.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventory and have more working capital.

loans.name: Suriya

texts.en: Suriya is 54-year-old housewife. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a mother of 3-children. Her husband owns a milk shop in the market which is the only source of income for the family. As the summer season has started, her husband wants to purchase a refrigerator for preserving milk. However, due to the lack of income he finds it difficult. Therefore, his wife Suriya is requesting a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan, so that she can help her husband to purchase a refrigerator. With the profits her husband wants to expand his business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator for preserving milk

loans.name: Alona

texts.en: Alona, is a 41-year-old woman, married, has four children and lives in Poblacion 3, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. For a living, she owns and manages her sari sari store selling goods in the local community for the past 5 years and has an income of 2,500 PHP a month. She became a member of GDMPC in the year 2010 to gain access to financial sources. She is now requesting 3,000 PHP to purchase new items to expand her product selection. She plans to repair her house to improve the entire family's living condition.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand product selection

loans.name: Hazel

texts.en:
Hazel is 41 years old and lives in Poblacion, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has 2 children. 

Hazel is engaged in the farming industry, particularly in rice production and earns approximately 4,000 PHP each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing fertilizers for her rice production activity. 

Hazel has been a member of PMPC for 10 years. In the future, Hazel hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers

loans.name: Nellie

texts.en:
Nellie is 47 years old and lives in Matugas Alto, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has 2 children. 

Nellie is engaged in poultry raising and earns approximately 3,000 PHP each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional sacks of feed for her poultry raising business. 

Nellie has been a member of PMPC for 10 years. In the future, Nellie hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: To be used in purchasing additional sacks of feed

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe is 68 years old and widowed. She lives in Tinaclaan, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a banana farm, planting and harvesting bananas for sale in the local community to earn a living. She has been in this business for over ten years and earns 6,000 PHP every month. 

She joined GDMPC in 2010, and now she has requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to pay the costs of banana farm weeding and maintenance. In the future, she wants to make improvements on her house and to have better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to pay the costs of banana farm weeding and maintenance

loans.name: Nusrat

texts.en: Nusrat is a 35 year-old housewife. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a mother of four children. She owns a stitching school. Income generated from her business plays a vital role in the family's income. Presently, she wants to purchase a sewing machine for the school. However, due to the lack of finances she finds it difficult. Therefore, Nusrat has requested a loan from Kiva's partner, BRAC Pakistan, to purchase a sewing machine. Nusrat is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To purchase sewing machine.

loans.name: Mao's Group

texts.en:
Mao is aged 30 years and married. She lives with her husband and one daughter, in a rural area located in the Moung Russey district, Cambodia. She is a rice farmer on two hectares of farmland. She has been a rice farmer for ten years, while her husband catches fish.
